name: agjcalendar
author: Andrew G. Johnson <andrew@andrewgjohnson.com>
description: agjCalendar is a plugin for the jQuery Javascript library to deal with calendars, dates and date ranges

scripts.lint: eslint source/agjCalendar/jquery.agjCalendar.js & eslint tests/*.js & eslint examples/*.js & eslint eslint.config.js & eslint nyc.config.js & eslint stylelint.config.js & eslint gulpfile.js & stylelint source/agjCalendar/jquery.agjCalendar.css & stylelint source/agjCalendar/jquery.agjCalendar.themes.css
scripts.test: npm run lint & npm run qunit
